Release notes for Kendo UI Professional v2018.2.620

Components

What's new

  • Remove legacy css from dataviz styles (#4251)

What's fixed

  • suite parameter of the widgetInstance method is mandatory in ts definitions (#4277)
  • k-ng-model does not update $dirty and $pristine when ng-form directive is used (#4026)
  • Inconsistency between custom formatting and standard formatting. (#3622)

AngularJS

What's fixed

  • ComboBox clear value button simply resets the combo value to the initial k-ng-model value, when filter is configured (#3708)
  • Not working AngularJS two way databinding of RangeSlider (#1314)

AutoComplete

What's fixed

  • Clear button is displayed when no item is selected (#4192)

ButtonGroup

What's new

  • Add iconClass setting (#4247)

Chat

What's fixed

  • Erroneous calculation in card layout (#4252)
  • Messages displayed for wrong Chat user

ComboBox

What's fixed

  • Breaking Cascading dropdowns tab focus fails (#3558)
  • Input text is not visible in Combobox in Flat theme (#4266)
  • Value clearing is not working in scenario with filter and virtualization (#4254)
  • Clear button is displayed when no item is selected (#4192)
  • ComboBox clear value button simply resets the combo value to the initial k-ng-model value, when filter is configured (#3708)

ContextMenu

What's fixed

  • ContextMenu close event fires multiple times (#3509)

DataSource

What's fixed

  • DataSource throws an error when having nested property with null parent object (#2981)

DatePicker

What's fixed

  • [DatePicker]: Setting "dateInput" option programmatically doesn't work (#4186)

Dialog

What's fixed

  • Dialog action callback function is called twice when triggered with Enter key (#4286)

Draggable

What's fixed

  • autoScroll does not work if the container is the body Chrome and Edge (#3741)
  • Draggable. AutoScroll: true brakes scrolling in Chrome 61 and Edge (#3678)
  • The Draggable is not auto-scrolled on MS Edge if all of the area is not visible initially and there is a vertical scrollbar on the page. (#2771)

Drawing

What's fixed

  • When exporting image to PDF with Drawing API an error occur if the mime type is not set correctly. (#4184)

DropDownTree

What's fixed

  • DropDownTree items are available for removal with the X button when the widget is disabled (#4310)
  • Unexpected multiple selected nodes in single selection DropDownTree with filtering (#4293)
  • DropDownTree value on change event is not empty, when the event is triggered by clear button or Esc key (#4228)

Editor

What's fixed

  • Editor Insert Hyperlink dialog allows injecting <script>
  • Table cells in Editor are not resizable as of R2 2018 (#4264)
  • Scroll bar is not displayed on entering a new line in br tag mode (Chrome) (#4222)
  • JavaScript error is thrown on paste in Internet Explorer (#4212)
  • F10 hides the toolbar with inline mode (#3796)
  • Underline and BackColor Editor tools remove tags, although custom classes set to tags should prevent removal (#3508)
  • Empty tags remain after deleting the Editor's content (#3493)
  • Pasting in inline elements trims br tags (#3354)
  • Editor messages configuration does not alter the dropdown tools tooltip (#2864)
  • Selected content in contentEditable=false elements is cleared on Ctrl+V (#1705)
  • Incorrect return type void in typescript definitions for Editor's encodedValue method (#4276)

Gantt

What's fixed

  • Undesired view navigation on editing a task in the Gantt's treelist when navigatable is set to true (#3397)

Grid

What's new

  • Add formatting functionality to the Tabular PDF export columns (#4301)

What's fixed

  • Not preserved columns width during column reordering if there is a hidden column. (#3198)
  • When Virtual scrolling is enabled, PopUp edit window closes on error even after DataBinding event is prevented (#4172)
  • The width of a Multiheader column is changed after reordering if the first column in the group is hidden. (#3572)
  • Tabular PDF export not sizing date and number columns (#4296)
  • The Clear filter button fires the filter event multiple times in some scenarios (#3103)
  • Grid setDataSource method throws "e.fetch is not a function" error
  • Aria-describedby attributes of Grid's cells are not assocciated with the correspoding column header.

MVVM

What's fixed

  • Radio button 'checked' binding do not work if you set value to null. (#4240)

Menu

What's fixed

  • Having input in a sub menu item closes the popup on input focus in IE 11 on touch devices (#4156)

MultiSelect

What's new

  • Virtualized widget resets scroll position on deselect (#1640)

What's fixed

  • Clear button is displayed when no item is selected (#4192)
  • Typing Polish accented "ą" character in the MultiSelect causes all items to get selected (#4111)
  • MultiSelect clear button is not rendered when items are selected programmatically (#4034)
  • Clearing the MultiSelect's input does not clear the filter (#3998)
  • JAWS reader does not announce the label when a MultiSelect is wrapped by a label element (#2935)
  • MultiSelect: screen readers announce only one of the selected items (#2867)

NumericTextBox

What's fixed

  • The NumericTextBox is making an AngularJS form dirty on keydown even if the value is not changed. (#2994)

PDF Export

What's new

  • Add formatting functionality to the Tabular PDF export columns (#4301)

What's fixed

  • Tabular PDF export not sizing date and number columns (#4296)

Radial Gauge

What's new

  • Add pointer.length option

Scheduler

What's fixed

  • Scheduler does not parse properly the start and end dates in the eventTemplate when Date grouping is used in Month view (#4178)
  • Scheduler editor closes automatically on creating an event through the keyboard (#4040)
  • Resized event incorrectly displayed in Scheduler's timelineWeek view (showWorkHours: true) (#3294)

Slider

What's fixed

  • Browser's dragging of the drag handles is not prevented (#2789)
  • Not working AngularJS two way databinding of RangeSlider (#1314)

Sortable

What's fixed

  • autoScroll does not work if the container is the body Chrome and Edge (#3741)

Splitter

What's fixed

  • Splitter remove method removes panes from other widget instances (#3980)

Spreadsheet

What's fixed

  • Data is lost after Undo command (#4169)
  • export button causes form submit (#4118)

TimePicker

What's fixed

  • TimePicker doesn't show value when re selecting after deleting. (#4179)

ToolBar

What's fixed

  • An anchor in custom ToolBar item does not navigate on pressing Enter key (#4197)

TreeView

What's fixed

  • Item does not expand when the item is filtered in loadOnDemand="true" scenario (#3313)
  • Vertically not centered TreeView checkboxes
  • Unexpected page scrolling on pressing Space, when a disabled TreeView node with checkboxes is focused

Upload

What's fixed

  • Async Upload Vue wrapper loses its reference in the this.$refs object after the first successful upload (#4147)
